rukus.text: vetlu `aleyhim nebee nuh. iz kale likavmihi ya kavmi in kane kebura `aleykum mekami vetezkiri biayati-llahi fe`ale-llahi tevekkeltu feecmi`u emrakum vesurakaekum summe la yekun emrukum `aleykum gummeten summe-kdu ileyye vela tunzirun
fein tevelleytum fema seeltukum min ecr. in ecriye illa `ale-llahi veumirtu en ekune mine-lmuslimin
fekezzebuhu fenecceynahu vemem me`ahu fi-lfulki vece`alnahum halaife veagrakne-llezine kezzebu biayatina. fenzur keyfe kane `akibetu-lmunzerin
summe be`asna mim ba`dihi rusulen ila kavmihim fecauhum bilbeyyinati fema kanu liyu'minu bima kezzebu bihi min kabl. kezalike natbe`u `ala kulubi-lmu`tedin
summe be`asna mim ba`dihim musa veharune ila fir`avne vemeleihi biayatina festekberu vekanu kavmem mucrimin
felemma caehumu-lhakku min `indina kalu inne haza lesihrum mubin
kale musa etekulune lilhakki lemma caekum. esihrun haza. vela yuflihu-ssahirun
kalu eci'tena litelfitena `amma vecedna `aleyhi abaena vetekune lekume-lkibriyau fi-l'ard. vema nahnu lekuma bimu'minin
felemma cae-sseharatu kale lehum musa elku ma entum mulkun
felemma elkav kale musa ma ci'tum bihi-ssihr. inne-llahe seyubtiluh. inne-llahe la yuslihu `amele-lmufsidin
